lead_paragraph: FRANKEL--Andrew. The Board of Governors and members of Fairview Country Club note with profound sorrow the passing of our beloved longtime member Andrew "Pete" Frankel. The Frankels were members at the club for sixty years; Pete served as President from 1996-1998. On behalf of all our members we express our deepest sympathy to his wife Anita, their children Donna, Liz and David, their three grandchildren, and the entire family. Fredric C. Apter, President; Linda Wiltsek, Secretary 1/3
